name: Foliodock API
author: Timo HÃ¶ner

sections.description:
Foliodock API allows the app-builder at foliodock.com to retrieve your WordPress content using HTTP requests. You can select a category or tag to select the posts that Foliodock should import to build your portfolio app.

This plugin is just a simplified version of the plugin JSON-API from dphiffer.

See foliodock.com for more informations or a demo.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the foliodock-api folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or install directly through the plugin installer.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress or by using the link provided by the plugin installer.
  3. Go to the Foliodock API Plugin Settings and activate it
  4. Select your Category or Tag to choose your source
  5. Enter the responding URL to foliodock.com to get your App

short_description: JSON API to build your own portfolio Webapp with your Wordpress Posts with the help of Foliodock.com.
